## The Challenge: Global Active Travel Planning

:::: {.columns}

::: {.column width="50%"}
**Traditional Problems:**
- Fragmented, piecemeal planning
- Limited evidence base
- Lack of standardized methods
- Poor international knowledge transfer
:::

::: {.column width="50%"}
**Our Solution:**
- Open-source, evidence-based tools
- Scalable methodology
- International capacity building
- Cultural adaptation framework
